package.description:
This package is a driver for Sparkfun's 9D Razor imu:
http://www.sparkfun.com/commerce/product_info.php?products_id=9623 sku: SEN-09623
It uses the rutgers-ros-pkg avr_bridge as a wrapper around the sf9domahrs code base from : http://code.google.com/p/sf9domahrs/
package.author: Adam Stambler
